name: A Copybook should not include other Copybooks
description: This rule shows all copybooks including other copybooks.
output:
Associated to each COBOL Copybook with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of violation patterns
- Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code:
  - COPY directive
rationale: For maintenability reasons it is better to avoid defining copybooks including other copybooks. The code becomes difficult to understand and so to maintain.
remediation: Try to avoid including copybooks in copybooks. The required copybooks should be explicitly included in the calling programs.
